parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: Http2
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable `HTTP/2`.

*   `open`: `HTTP/2` is enabled.
*   `close`: `HTTP/2` is disabled.
*   `globalConfig`: Global configurations are used.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the domain name that you want to update.

parameters.name: MustHttps
parameters.description: Specifies whether to forcibly use HTTPS.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
The type of the protocol. Valid values:

*   HTTPS
*   HTTP

parameters.name: TlsMax
parameters.description: The maximum version of Transport Layer Security (TLS).
